title: To Those Who Long for My Destruction
summary: No summary available.

title: Grand Duchess’s Constitution
summary:
I was possessed by a wicked woman who was about to be hanged in a year.

In order to survive, she entered a contract marriage with the cursed northern grand duke.

He was obviously a husband who blushed at the mere touch of her hands at first…

“I thought you liked… my chest.”

“I can’t stop because your lips taste so sweet.”

I’m in trouble because my husband is so demanding!

Moreover, he said there were no tourists in this wonderful city, so I was thinking of helping out a bit.

“The north become the hottest place in the empire?”

“Special goods sold out as soon as they were released?”

Why is everything going so well?

Is it perhaps because of me, the Grand Duchess?

title: From Six to Sovereignty: The Girl Who Ruled
The Ugly Lady’s Secret Pouch
summary:
When Yunseol wakes up as "Laila el Este" in the novel, “Bird Cage,” she is horrified.

Though Laila may be beautiful, her beauty is the reason the three male leads obsess over her and make her life a living hell. As such, Laila decides to use her professional makeup skills to become high society’s infamous ugly duckling.

But out of nowhere, she receives a marriage proposal from Duke Montefeltra, a fellow outcast who is ostracized for his unattractive looks.

Will this turn of events help Laila escape the novel’s bad ending once and for all?

title: The Words of The Beloved Sun
summary:
The collected anthologies of Satoshi Mizukami's oneshots.  
  
Volume 1: Ribbit Ribbit
- Chapter 1 - Gekogeko:
About a girl whose boyfriend is a frog. 
- Chapter 2 - Yaichirou  
- Chapter 3 - Densetsu no Otoko  
- Chapter 4 - Joreishi  
- Chapter 5 - Dokusho no Jikan  
- Chapter 6 - Kaijin Natsugorou  
- Chapter 7 - High Jump Rabbit  
- Chapter 8 - Koutetsu Shinshou Omega Frog  
- Chapter 9 - Ryuu to Shoujo to Hyakkichou
  
Volume 2: Cheep Cheep
- Chapter 1-3 - Piyopiyo  
A tale of a chick which never grows into a chicken.    
- Chapter 4 - Makai Zanyouken: Dokidoki Jigokuhen  
- Chapter 5 - Ganbatte-chan to Yameyouze  
- Chapter 6 - Erabu Michi  
- Chapter 7 - Thunder Girl to Hyakkichou  
- Chapter 8 - Kazaana Atama to Hyakkichou

Volume 3: Galactic Emperor Ginga Thunder's Excellent Adventure  
- Chapter 1 - My Fist  
Earth's ultimate weapon is deployed to face a threat of intergalactic proportions, and learns a little something about life.  
- Chapter 2 - Nell, The Artist of Shambala  
- Chapter 3 - Wedding Bells in Monster Town (Koi no Suzu Hyakki)  
- Chapter 4 - The Awakening  
The terrible origin tale of the scourge of worlds, Galactic Emperor Ginga Thunder.  
- Chapter 5 - Kare no Tabi ga Owaru  
- Chapter 6 - Wani Onii-san (My Brother is a Crocodile)  
Onii-san has turned into a crocodile! How is his sister, who has a brother complex, going to use love to overcome this forbidden interspecies obstacle?  
- Chapter 7 - Suna no Wakusei no Tami (Denizens of the Sand Planet)   

Chapter 66 of [Lucifer and the Biscuit Hammer](https://mangadex.org/title/6ebe8b8a-7bac-45f0-8652-4b9d52b95644) was also included in this volume.

Volume 4: Wandering World  
- Chapter 1 - Takeyashiki Shimai, Miyaburareru  
- Chapter 2 - Matsuri Connection:  
About a shut-in girl and a dwarf alien, who lives on her head.  
- Chapter 3 - Too Late for Fantasy:  
When given a magic lamp, 37-year-old Tohru Sugamo wishes for his childhood dream to come true and gains all the powers he thought up once upon a time as a wannabe novelist, but it turns out an eighth grader's ideas aren't the most original - or the kinds of things you'd want causing havoc in your married life.  
- Chapter 4 - Fantastic Eats (Enigma Viking)  
A monster hunter and his erstwhile apprentice make their living selling unknown delicacies. This stuff is safe to eat, right?  
- Chapter 5 - Walking the Void  
When Amada Yuu was a child, the apartments were his entire world. When he learned the truth, the infinte void stretching outside would come to reside inside him as well.

title: They Live in the Princess’ Flower Garden
summary:
In this new life Ibelia just wanted to be loved but she was born with the talent of a master of spirits, thanks to the seal of the king of spirits. She receives unconditional love from her parents and siblings, and is constantly chased by knights who want to be her guards. Furthermore, she also attracts the attention of several powerful men, who have ambitious plans for her. 

One of them is Ashrath, the king of demons and the only dragon in the other world, who wants to make her his bride. Another is Lelian, her childhood friend and the future emperor, who promises to build her an empire. And there are still others who hide their secrets and intentions. Ibelia will have to deal with them all, while walking along the flower path of an irresistible girl.

title: I Became the Cure for the Tyrant in the Waste Novel
summary: No summary available.

title: The Support Ate it All
summary:
The protagonist, who was enjoying the RPG game Dragon Slayer Academy, succeeds in raising 1,000 S-class heroes as the strongest supporter in the game.

One day, a mysterious quest window appears in front of him, and he is presented with a hidden quest that allows him to raise EX-class heroes that surpass S-class heroes.

Upon accepting the quest, he finds himself transported into the game world of Dragon Slayer Academy...

title: MookHyang – Dark Lady
summary:
The exceptional martial artist and proud hierarch of the Demonic Sect, Mookhyang, winds up in a strange new fantasy realm after falling victim to a curse cast by his enemies, the Blood Sect. But when Mookhyang’s incredible control over qi, or mana, becomes known, it’s only a matter of time before he gets cursed again… and turned into a young lady?! 

In this world of elves, mages, knights, and dragons, will a mastery of Chinese martial arts be enough for one man (or woman) to fight his way back home? Or will this humbled warrior finally concede defeat? 

[Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_aBOSaO6uOk)

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B5%ED%96%A5-%EB%8B%A4%ED%81%AC%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EB%94%94/2341)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28581)

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%A2%A8%E5%8A%8D%E7%95%99%E9%A6%99/59)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/31401)

- [Official German Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/mookhyang-dark-lady-de)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/mookhyang-dark-lady-fr)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%AE%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87_%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%89/99)
---
- [Original Book <Yes24>](http://www.yes24.com/Product/Goods/89958058)

- [Original Book <Aladin>](https://www.aladin.co.kr/shop/wproduct.aspx?ItemId=237680077)

title: True Education
summary:
Na Hwa-Jin’s teaching techniques are pretty violent for someone who works in the Ministry of Education.

That being said, when punishments don't seem to work on even the worst of school bullies, there is no better man for the job.

Sometimes you can’t get a good education until those bullies are taught a lesson.


---

**Links:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5620215)

+++Ch. 125 drama
After the publication of ch. 125, the manhwa was suspended "indefinitely" and the Korean ch. 125 was removed while the official English translation was completely taken down. The hiatus lasted 100 days.

By [@webtoonofficial](https://www.tiktok.com/@webtoonofficial) on Tiktok
![webtoon statement 1/3](https://forums.mangadex.org/attachments/tiktok-statement1-png.6912)
![webtoon statement 2/3](https://forums.mangadex.org/attachments/tiktok-statement2-png.6915)
![webtoon statement 3/3](https://forums.mangadex.org/attachments/tiktok-statement3-png.6918)

By the creators:
![Creators statement](https://forums.mangadex.org/attachments/creator-notice-png.6921/)
+++

title: What do you think of cosmic horror?
S-Class Hunter Heals with Monsters
summary:
For decades, I was a mindless Chimera Hunter—a weapon forged and discarded. But after dying in the depths of a monster-infested gate, I woke up… human.

Now, as Cheon Dowoon, I just wanted peace—a quiet life, a warm cup of tea, and zero demonic nonsense.

Too bad fate had other plans.

First, a lost hellhound dug up my garden. Then, a snarky shadow beast started napping on my porch. Worst of all? My old “acquaintances” keep showing up—some begging for help, others… for my head.

Revenge? Survival?
Please. I just want to put on pants first.

—A former killing machine’s “relaxing” second life begins… in a front yard that’s basically monster daycare.

title: Taming the Munchkin
summary:
She was reborn as the antagonist of a fantasy novel, a child who bears her family’s resentment.

As it stands, her fate is to end up on the guillotine at the hands of the furious villagers!

Kynemeia, for the sake of a comfortable future, plans to gather some Munchkins to govern the fief. However, there’s one problem…

Kynemeia stared blankly at the boy sitting in the underground prison.

“…Why?”

“I got caught.”

She’s on the receiving end of an unwanted obsession from a suspicious mage?!

This is the story of the struggles of a Grand Duke’s daughter who wishes to transform her life

and the Munchkin mage who feigns innocence!

title: Shh! I’m Not a Villainess, I’m a Detective!
The Villainous Family Is Against Independence
summary:
Elodie, the illegitimate daughter of a family of murderous villains with no sense of family, suddenly discovers her past life!

She realizes that she has been reincarnated in a novel she read in a previous life. When the real heroine shows up three years later, she realizes she's been abandoned by her villainous family and is destined to be killed. She was doing okay until her sister showed up, and she thought, "Let's be independent from this family!"

"Independence, what kind of bullshit is that?"

"Who dared to put such ideas into your head?"

"Sister, you don't think you're going to run away by any chance, do you?"

My family is against independence? I want to live, let me be independent!

title: The Delusional Hunter in Another
summary:
"I have a little secret. I'm from an alien planet far, far away.

However... fate had other plans. I found myself reincarnated into the body of someone who had literally starved to death! Will Gi-ryeo be able to find a way to adapt to this strange planet called Earth and keep his true identity hidden?"

title: Get Some Honey By Copying Skills
summary:
Junhyuk’s relentless journey to completely rewrite a past filled with regrets begins. After finally obtaining the Stone of Regression with great difficulty, Junhyuk carefully prepares to return to the past. However, an urgent crisis strikes, forcing him to initiate the regression with only the preparations he has managed so far.

“Haha, then let’s meet in the past.” Leaving behind those who sought his life, Junhyuk regresses to the past. “This is the start of something new.” Armed with heightened senses and the ability to copy, Junhyuk embarks on a daring mission to fix a past riddled with regrets.

title: Full-Time Awakening
summary:
As the captain of the Divine Legion and the strongest Awakener, Bai Yi is betrayed by a comrade, witnessing all his teammates die before his eyes. Only then does he realize he has always been a pawn of those in power. Having lost everything, he is reborn 20 years ago, back to his middle school days before awakening.

At that time, his family and teammates are still alive. To save them, to avenge the betrayer, and to overthrow the entire corrupt ruling system, he embarks on a lonely path of strength.

title: Starting from Level 1: I’ll Defeat All Reincarnated Monsters in My Secret Dungeon
summary:
Shinobu Ijima, a young man who died with his sister in a sudden explosion, is reincarnated into the world of Lavita Online, a game he played as a hobby. The only problem is, he’s back at level 1…
When Shinobu finds out that his sister will also be reincarnated into his world, he begins a hellish training regime to gain the power to compete against max-level players.
The WEBTOON version of the hugely popular original novel is finally here!!

title: In the Grasp of a Loving Yet Possessive Male Lead
I Was Mistaken As a Monstrous Genius
Rebirth in the end times: I reached the top by opening boxes
summary:
Jiang Xiaoyong was betrayed and killed by a green tea girl in the apocalypse, but was accidentally resurrected a year ago and obtained the blind box system. 

He was always one step ahead of others, collecting supplies and spending a fortune to build a safe house before the apocalypse. He became stronger through the system and avenged his enemies in his previous life. 

From then on, he embarked on the road to the king's counterattack.

title: Demon Lord’s Martial Arts Ascension
summary:
Now that the demonic realm and the heavenly realm have called a truce, the human world has returned to an era of peace.

Jeon Minchul lives the life of an ordinary college student until the day he comes across an artifact from the war and remembers — in his past life, he was the demon king who brought the world to its knees.

Upon recalling these memories, Minchul awakens his old powers, along with some new ones. But can this demon king harness the powers of both good and evil to protect the peace?

title: Black Chain
summary: The Emperor’s consort committed suicide. Hassolan, who devoted 14 years to Emperor Akelans, hung herself but woke up 14 years in the past. No matter what, she keeps returning to that day. The once cold Emperor now fiercely refuses to let her go, saying, “You are my mate. If you don’t want it, I won’t be Emperor.”

title: Martial Evolution: Start by Awakening the King of Monsters
summary: A youth named Yi He is reborn into the world of powerful Martial arts and awakens the King of Monsters with the strongest bloodline!

title: Evolution Begins With A Big Tree
summary:
Reborn as a willow tree!? Resurrection of spiritual energy, rise of all things. The reborn willow has also embarked on the path of evolution. It can evolve infinitely, is it “divine power” or “curse”?

Official Translations:
[Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/146958)

title: Zombie Dad
summary:
A world overrun by zombies, and 100 chances for Ryu Min-Seok to save his daughter. But just when he's about to fail for the 100th time, he comes back to life?! 

The zombie apocalypse survival story of a father who awakens as a zombie to protect his daughter!

title: The Man Is A Real Dog
summary:
In a fantasy novel, I suddenly became Astel, the younger sister who never appeared. While my brother Cassian is fighting for revenge of the clan, it is my duty to find and deal with the final villain that remains unrevealed even at the end of the series! In order to do that, I must first enter the mansion of the northern duke, where the traitors of the family are hiding. But somehow, I became the 'mate' of duke Anais, a beast and a prime candidate for the ultimate villain. Besides...

"Kiss me now, Astel."

In order to live, I have to communicate with my 'mate' every day, but there’s no such thing in the original!

"Shouldn’t we go see the ocean you like today?"

"I-I don’t think I can. I have to go see Mr. Cassian today."

The duke gritted his teeth with a cold face. I was a little scared when I saw this look on his face. Maybe he’s teething? Because he’s a wild beast!

===

The other day, when I was living under the duke’s care. My brother, Cassian, left his son in my care for a while. However, it seems the duke has been entangled in a huge misunderstanding.

"They will become our child."

"What...?"

"Cassian Gray will disappear from this world right now, so you won't be his bride anymore."

Yes...? Since when did I become Cassian Gray’s bride?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B7%B8-%EB%82%A8%EC%9E%90%EB%8A%94-%EC%A0%9C-%EC%B9%9C%EC%98%A4%EB%B9%A0%EC%9D%B8%EB%8D%B0%EC%9A%94-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EB%8B%98/3143), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60549099)

[Official Japanese Translation / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/126242)

title: The Lone SSS-Class Summoner
summary: Zhang Ze crosses over to a parallel world where people rely on the Magic Domain to fight monsters and become stronger to resist the invasion of demons from the Devil’s Cave. For the sake of his sister, Zhang Ze enters the magic realm under the name of Asura, and then he unexpectedly awakens the strongest SSS-level talent summoning ability! The higher the level of the summoning art, the more monsters you can summon, and the more you can upgrade, it’s simply heaven-defying!

title: Return of the Mad Demon
summary: In the Yamatoba Empire, where two races, humans and night demons, have existed since time immemorial. Iku, whose hair and eyes are as pale as white snow, is mistreated by her family because of her strange, demon-like appearance. She is treated as little more than a servant until the day she is sold to a man for money, a fate she thought impossible to escape from... One day, however, the next head of a prominent family, Subaru, learns of Iku's secret and offers her a marriage proposal. Though it is a political marriage, the two, both burdened with a damaged past, gradually become attracted to each other...?

title: The Last Adventurer
summary:
In the Era of Adventure kickstarted by the spawning of Gates, marked by absolute hopelessness, destitute, desperation, and despair, everyone had given up their hope and lost their courage to continue fighting - except one adventurer that refused to go down until his last breath.

"You are the only one left, Last Adventurer Elpam."

As the history of adventurers was forced to come to an end, the Last Adventurer returned to where this story all began.

title: How to Live as a Villain
summary:
Rishe, the daughter of a duke, is stuck in a time loop that begins at the moment her engagement is annulled and ends with her early demise at the age of 20. She has now begun her seventh loop.  
  
In her past do-overs, Rishe experienced various occupations, including being a merchant, a pharmacist, and a knight. But this time around, she simply wishes to live a long and leisurely life!  
  
That *was* the plan, only for it to be derailed by an unprecedented marriage proposal from her killer in the previous loop, the neighbouring country's Crown Prince—?!  


---

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1784ga/)

title: The Abandoned Bachelorette Enjoys Her Simple Life
summary:
Catherine did not want much.

Even if she did not have luxurious clothes and shoes, she was alright with her hideously frayed bedroom curtains and her shoes that were so worn at the soles it was different in height.

It had been two years since she started enduring it for the sake of her late mother.

She no longer felt the need to do that.

"Alright, I'll leave."

Catherine was tired of everything.

***

"Are you the Pope's watchdog? You've done well coming all the way here."

The man who intruded her home was drenched from head to toe.
She could see mud squished beneath his black leather boots.

Unbelievable.
To think he would drag in not grass, but mud, while she was cleaning the floors!

"You've got quite the disguise. Even I was almost fooled into thinking that you're just an ordinary city woman---"
"Wipe it."

She pushed the rag she held onto the man.

"Why are you looking at me so foolishly? I told you to wipe the floor. And it's not proper to show your sword when it's our first time meeting each other. Is it not enough that you intruded that you would want to be reported for attempted murder?"

title: Seduce Her
summary: Harold is the descendant of the hero who defeated the evil demon king. In this peaceful era, Harold has become a convenient handyman for the townsfolk. One day, a sacred book predicting the world's destruction is discovered. The condition to avert this catastrophe is... "you must complete the 'Newlyweds Quest' with the demon king's daughter." Thus begins Harold's unexpected married life with Yona, the demon king's daughter. While Harold still feels bewildered by all this, not only can Yona perfectly handle the household chores, she sweetly pampers him when he's tired. However, she harbors a secret...

title: Thriving Agency for Regretful Male Leads in Full Operation!
summary:
A detective who'll find your leading lady for 500 won has appeared!

Out of all the countless web novel protagonists, I wasn't a romance-fantasy noble lady, a cool hunter, or a holy saintess. Of all things, to think I've been reincarnated as a 'private investigator'… And on top of that, my clients are all regretful male leads?

"Hurry up and find my woman."

"All of a sudden?"

Still, now that I've started, I have no choice but to see it through. Just how many 'runaway lead' stories do you think I've read?! The runaway female lead always gets caught soon enough. They come back one way or another! The cool guy, the hero, the beastly man— I'll make sure all the regretful male leads get their happy ending.

title: Love or Love
summary: Zagan is feared as an evil mage, he is awkward and has a sharp tongue, and once again had to put down thieves that encroached on his territory when he was researching that morning. In a dark auction, he finds a white slave elf, Nephie, who holds a peerless beauty. Falling in love with her at first sight, he uses his fortune to buy her, but as poor as he is socially, he doesn’t understand how to connect with her. Thus, the clumsy cohabitation of the mage that can’t convey his love, and the slave that pines for her master but doesn’t understand how to bring it up, begins.

title: I Became the Tutor of the Royal Twins
summary:
An elementary school teacher in her past life, and a private tutor in the present.

Sarah Popo uses all her past life experiences in her second life.

She worked as a highly sought out tutor for aristocratic children.

Her goal is to be the owner of her own school!

Then, one day, the Emperor of the Empire sought her out.

“I want Miss Popo to be my siblings’ tutor.”

Water bombs, flour bombs, bug attacks.

What kind of offer did he make? To make her the tutor of a pair of notorious twins with all kinds of vicious pranks!

A very sweet one, of course.

The devil’s temptation shook Sarah’s life.

title: Logging 10,000 Years into the Future
summary: At the beginning of the martial dao, abnormal beasts invaded the world. Humanity’s martials had to retreat in defeat time and time again. Lu Sheng transmigrates to that time, but in his dreams he enters a world 10 000 years later. The foundational body refining method from 10k years in the future is several thousand times more effective than the current one. Then there’s the breathing method, body refining pill formula, and sacred martial law from 10k years later… Despite developing martial arts for 10k years, humanity was annihilated! Their martial arts civilization reached the apex, and yet there was no one left to inherit it. Except Lu Sheng, he’s exactly that last spark of hope!

title: Worthless Profession: Dragon Tamer
summary: Combining reality with a gaming world where ferocious beasts roam freely, filled with numerous mysteries and dungeons. In order to defend against the onslaught of these beasts, everyone undergoes class transfers and crazily levels up. On the day of his transfer, Lu Fan becomes a hidden class – Dragon Tamer. However, due to the immense strength of dragons, it is deemed impossible for anyone to tame them, earning Dragon Tamer the reputation of being the most useless class. Fortunately, he awakens the Super Treasure Map System. As Lu Fan, with his mighty dragon, sweeps through everything, the entire world trembles.

title: Prepaid Dragon King Tanks Everything!
summary:
“You ate me, so at least give me some kind of compensation, yeah?!”

Dragon King: “Fine! I’ll give you a prepaid cultivation technique—comprehend it first, then catch up with the training later!”

Me: “You think that’s enough?! I had to smell your nasty dragon breath—mental damage times two, buddy!”

Dragon King: “What do you want from me?!”

Me: “From now on, we’re like immortals sharing a single health bar. All the damage? You take it!”

Dragon King: “Damn it! You lunatic! Why does my ten-thousand-war-chariots-level HP bar feel so short now?! Guess it’s time to get a job…”

title: There is no mercy
summary:
Zeolith wanted a chill life, but when he turned 15, his villages rule was that they had to go to the vocational school "Velciel" where each student will choose their profession. Zeolith wanted an easy job where he could laze around all day, but the only options he got were: "The Highest Peak of the Human Race [Hero]", "The Strongest Ruler [Demon Emperor]", "The Title of the Strongest Magician [Great Sage]", "And the last one "The Lowest Title, a Job For Scum [Slave Merchant]".

None of the titles were a good option. He picked the lowest title [Slave Merchant], which is inconspicuous among them and seems to be easy to live. But, He doesn't know it yet. It's the lowest occupation but it is the strongest for him and the most annoying-tiring ones. A harem struggle to be swayed by a variety of women, slutty alluring girls from elderly to younger ones who are his childhood friend's, the poisonous plantgirl, elves, cat ears adventurer, Loli Demon Lord, et cetera.

title: The Rankers Guide to Live an Ordinary Life
summary:
The first S-class Awakened is really a third-rate student?!

In the 21st century, the world became a 'fantasy'. In a South Korea filled with despair, S-classes have descended! The greatest of them - Witch Queen Jyo!

"Goddess Jyo... Queen Jyo... Who are you...? Who could it be?"

The true identity of the savior who has been shrouded in mystery for 10 years. Her identity? Gyung Jyo, a third-rate student, who's unable to make outgoing calls due to her mother's anger.and on the verge of being strangled and trapped in the abyss.

She was leading a peaceful and ordinary life as Korea's top unemployed person, however...

[The rankings are being updated.]
[Your current ranking has dropped to 2nd place.] 

"!?"

"I know who you are, Witch Queen."

Baek Dohyun, a regressor, appears in front of Gyung Jyo!

Will Gyung Jyo, an S-class Munchkin ranker, be able to maintain her comfortable and lazy tyrant life, as her well-rolling life turns upside down into the position of the world's savior?

title: Welcome to Dungeon Hotel
summary: In the Lapland region of Finland, the domain of snow, midnight sun, and auroras, there is the small Hotel Metsäpeura, run by two older gentlemen. One night during a terrible blizzard, a mysterious young man named Jun arrives at the hotel. He is clearly in dire straits, with a large tattoo on his back, no relatives and no money. However, the gentlemen warmly welcome him in and offer him a job at the hotel. The kindness of the people living in the harshness of nature will melt the heart of this awkward young man.

title: Legendary Youngest Son of the Marquis House
summary:
After getting revenge on the Thulcaan Empire, Jack Valantier took his last breath. But just when he thinks it's all over, he finds himself transported back to when he was 14!

From his negligent and wicked family to his loyal servant and caring sister, it's all just as he had remembered. But this time, Jack is armed to the teeth with decades of experience from his previous life! He's ready to give them hell, and those that have wronged him will pay dearly.

Because this time, he's invincible.

title: Heroes, Demons & Villains
summary:
A noble <Hero> who punishes evil while under the protection of gods.
A demon born with tremendous demonic powers, is the last surviving <Demon King>.
And I’m an experienced third-rate <Villiain> that roams around the land.

I want my Villain’s life to be over.
I was going to retire and spend the rest of my life in comfort but the child I picked up by accident turned out to be the demon king and the hero is chasing me to "repay the favor".
My comfortable retirement years are ruined!

The 99 demons that guard the Villain ?
Prepare to die… Yes, may God bless you, now die!

title: The Joseon prince went to America and didn’t return
summary: Due to a sudden natural disaster, Park Byung-jun, a Korean-American lobbyist, finds himself reincarnated as Yi Kang, the second son of Emperor Gojong of the Korean Empire, at the moment of his death. Armed with his knowledge of the original history, he crosses over to the United States and begins his own new business to amass wealth!

title: Fox Star Catcher
summary:
"What is your wish? I’ll weave a dream of fortune just for you!" 

Chilbok, a genius dream weaver who grants wishes in exchange for dreams. After ten years of rigorous training under his master, his ambition to enter the imperial palace shatters when he fails the crucial exam.

Before despair takes hold, a scarred and enigmatic figure appears before him. A royal-born mad man, scarred by life, Grand Prince Yeonmyeong.

This is the story of those chasing faintly shining dreams and seeking hidden stars amidst the clouds.

title: The Princess Imprints a Traitor
summary:
After the fall of the empire due to the homunculi, Evienrose, the 7th Princess, dies after drinking poison given by her younger sister who has taken their side. When she opens her eyes again, she has returned 8 years to the past. To stop the fall of the imperial family, Eve decides to turn 'Mikhael', the leader of the homunculi and the 'Monster of the Floating Prison', into her appointed knight.

"Mikhael, I need you, very much."

---
Princess Evienrose, despite advocating fiercely for the rights of the homunculi rebels, now awaits death at their hands… that is until she is poisoned by her own sister! Awakening eight years in the past, Eve now has one goal: become the Empress and liberate the homunculi to stop the rebellion from ever happening! To do this, she appoints the rebel king himself, Mikaelis Agnito, as her personal knight. But with Eve’s scheming sisters standing in the way, the fight for the crown is on, and the fate of the Hadelamid empire rests in her hands!

---
The seventh imperial princess, Evenrose, once died. Her last memory was of the royal family was destroyed by the Homunculus, the rebelling slaves, and of her sister who had sided with the rebels and urged her to escape her painful execution by swallowing poison. But when she opened her eyes again, "I...I'm not dead." She realizes that she had gone eight years back in time, back to a time before her cruel sister Bridgette was chosen as the next emperor. Given the opportunity to prevent the fall of the imperial family by being chosen as the next emperor herself, she decides to write her own article about Michael, the king of Homunculus and the monster of public prison, in order to win the emperor's heart. "I need you, Michael. Very badly." Will Evenrose be able to get him and protect the imperial family safely?

---
Other Official Translations:

* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/The-Traitor-Conqueror-Princess/3471)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66840)
